snippet: Dr. Halpern practiced for more than 50 years and wrote several books focusing on family and other relationships.
abstract: Howard M Halpern, therapist and self-help author, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Halpern practiced for more than 50 years and wrote several books focusing on family and other relationships.
